ANTE ⲁⲛⲧⲓ < հանդի hɑntʰi < CONTRA 𒃰𒋼𒊏𒀸 katteraš κατά katá “downwards, towards” 𓌨𓊀𓃆𓂢𓂣𓀡𓀒

𓂧- αντ- αντι- anti- “counter”

𓌢 𓈖 𓏌 𓏲 𓀀 𓀀 counterpart contestants companion ⇔ twin 𓌢 2 dual

𓍲 𓈖 𓏏 √contra?
𓍲 𓈖 𓏏 𓀜 contradict ⇔ 𓈖 𓏏 anti

𓐍 𓈖 √contra? *komteros cum + tra ⇔ intra extra
𓐍 𓈖 𓆑 contra… combatant enemy
𓐍 𓈖 𓂧 𓂾 tread down @ ground counter

contrast VERSUS

𓐍 𓏏 𓅓 𓋩 𓏛 | contract | חוזה khozé[m] qad.ma ⋍ عَقْد ʿaqd ⋍ akt ackord'maat?
𓐍 𓏏 𓅓 𓏏 𓋩 𓏛 | contract | চুক্তি cukti[m] 契約 gyeyak 계약
𓐍 𓏏 𓅓 𓏏 𓏛 | contract | catomt⋍kasund +++ co'tramt ⋍ contract قرارداد qerârdâd ⋍ 𓐍𓏏𓅓𓏏 qerrdamd

𓎝 𓎛 𓏜 CONTRA!?

𓂝 ⇔ 𓂜 in negation :
𓂝 𓃂 𓅱 impurity (𓂝 a¬ am¬ im¬ anti¬ 𓂜𓏏 contra? )

𓎛𓆰𓈖𓎨 hinder,encumber,obstruct < contra… ⇔ Kante, Schranke?

𓇋 𓍿 𓈖 𓏌 𓅱 𓂡 | opponent | ⇔ 𓃀 𓍿 𓈖 𓏌 𓅱 𓂝 𓀀 | rebel | √back?

ⲕⲟⲣϫ⳼ ↔ ⲕⲱⲣϫ cut down ⇔ kurz, kürzen core ground

𓌨 𐌲𐍂𐌿𐌽𐌳𐌿𐍃 Grund
𓌨 κάτω kartam
𓌨 قَاع qāʿ قَعْر qaʿr
𓌨 CR care o' carry grounder kurgan kyr vs sûr!𓀠 四​sick necro𓊹𓌨𓂋𓈉 𓌨 CR ≠KRi/KHr𓐍𓃺? gare/
𓌨 KERN,keh=less@P! grunter! 𓌨𓊹𓅂𓀀! ynder hinder-most! [maybe] 𓌨𓂋χόνδρ grain! Kern der Dinge = Grund! ¬cairn

Interestingly most words pertaining to 'down' in Egyptian start with Kh,Kr,K,CH,G/S gush/sous 𓋴 :

EG||meaning|note
-|-|-|-
𓎝 𓎛 𓏜||set down, lay down, apply, stack, stow, store up, lay aside, discard|
𓐍 𓆼 𓄿 𓅓 𓂢 bend (arm in respect), bow down
𓐍 𓂧 𓊛 travel downstream, northwards, flow (of water), North
𓐍 𓃀 𓅡 𓄿 𓌻 𓅪 𓁷 𓏤 downcast ?
𓋴 𓐍 𓀒||© overthrow, throw down, force into place (dislocated bone)| schr/thr compound consonant?
𓋴 𓇥 𓂋 𓁀||spend the night, sleep, lie down, go to rest, be inert, inactive, do in the night| sonar,snore
𓋴 𓐓 𓌇||strike, strike down| strike
𓋴 𓍬 𓍿 𓄿 𓂻||run down, flow | schütt
𓋴 𓉔 𓄿 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓂻||(v. infinitive) bring down, make to fall|shachah@HEB ++
𓋴 𓈎 𓂋 𓌪 𓂝||strike, strike down, clap (hands), grasp (hand)|scorch
𓋴 𓋴 𓊪 𓂧 𓇮 𓏜||© enliven (the downcast), penetrate (into)|
𓋴 𓅱 𓉔 𓈖||© throw down (building)|thwhn ➙ thrown -+
𓋴 𓅱 𓉔 𓈖 𓊊 𓏴 𓂡||© throw down (building)|shattern?
𓊃 𓎡 𓂋 𓀓 𓂢 𓅪||© make to bow down|se'curva
𓎡 𓊃 𓀓||bend down, bow down, be prostrate| ^^
𓎛 𓈞 𓋴 𓀉||sit down|hinsetz
𓉔 𓄿 𓉔 𓃀 𓍁 𓀜|| descend | harhb 𓌨 kārp אַראָפּגיין herabgehen < coborî! +++
𓉔 𓄿 𓉔 𓃀 𓍁 𓀜|| descend | καταβαίνω katabaínō 𓉔𓃀𓍁𓀜 هبط hbaṭ
𓉔 𓄿 𓉔 𓃀 𓍁 𓀜||come down, go down, descend, fall, befall (of age), drip, drop| ≠ hoch
𓉔 𓄿 𓂻||charge down upon (enemy), tackle (dangerous animal)|⋍hail down? 𐎊𐎗𐎄 יָרַד yarád उतरना utarnā
𓉔 𓄿 𓂻||charge down|𓌨 charge ចុះ coh

𓊪 𓐍 𓂧 𓀡||be turned upside down|verkehrt herum
𓊪 𓏏 𓐍 𓂻||cast (to the ground), put down (someone carried), be stretched out|put ground +++
𓊪 𓈖 𓂝 𓊛||turn upside down, turn (the eyes against someone)|wenden pöör̃ama
𓊜||turn upside down|

𓆱 𓐍 𓏏 𓂽||retire, retreat|υποχώρηση ypochórisi
𓆱 𓐍 𓏏 𓂻||retire, retreat, (re)turn, reverse |cretire @ Krete? < contra(ire) ?

𓐍 𓏏 𓆑 𓁷 𓏤||in front of, in the presence of|κᾰτᾰ́ 𓆑 of/von
𓐍 𓏏 𓆑||enemy|χθρός cetervi *ḱétrus शत्रु śátru ಶತ್ರು śatru sattrəw សត្រូវ kẻ thù@Viet!
𓐍 𓏏 𓆑||enemy|opponent, contrahent, con+trahō “drag”
𓎡 𓏏 𓐍 𓏏 𓏛 𓀀 𓏥 others > 𓎡 𓏏 cetera etc ceteri 𓎡 𓇋 𓇋 > hetero > other …
𓎡 𓈖 𓏏 𓅪 𓏥 | dislike (of someone) | contra …
